p: A key discovery in understanding the mechanism of SARS-CoV-2 infection concerns the role of the androgen-responsive transmembrane serine protease 2 (TMPRSS2), that is expressed by specific epithelial tissues (including those of the respiratory and digestive tracts), facilitating the SARS-CoV-2 entry in the human airways by cleaving the viral spike (S) protein [22], [23], [19] ( Fig. 2).
